item.title: cfssl命令学习-生成证书
item.description: 准备cfssl环境 wget https://pkg.cfssl.org/R1.2/cfssl_linux-amd64 -O /usr/local/bin/cfssl wget https://pkg.cfssl.org/R1.2/cfssljson_linux-amd64 -O /usr/local/bin/cfssljson wget https://pkg.cfssl.org/R1.2/cfssl-certinfo_linux-amd64 -O /usr/local/bin/cfssl-certinfo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/cfssl* 生成ca证书 证书配置 cat > ca-config.json <<EOF { "signing": { "default": { "expiry": "8760h" }, "profiles": { "app": { "usages": [ "signing", "key encipherment", "server auth", "client auth" ], "expiry": "8760h" } } } } EOF 证书请求配置 cat > ca-csr.json <<EOF { "CN": "k8s", "key": { "algo": "rsa", "size": 2048 }, "names": [ { "C": "CN", "ST": "BeiJing", "L": "BeiJing", "O": "k8s", "OU": "System" } ] } EOF 命令
